General.Name: Valoe Corp
General.Description: Valoe Oyj provides automated production technology for solar modules in the European Union, the rest of Europe, the United America, Asia, and Africa. The company manufactures double-sided solar cells using interdigitated back contact (IBC) technology; unconventional odd form modules; one-sided IBC back contact modules; bifacial IBC back contact modules; automated module lines and module components. The company was formerly known as Cencorp Oyj. Valoe Oyj was incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in Mikkeli, Finland.
